title: Hollywood studio's response to Ted 2 complaint a "good start" (De Montfort University)
text: ( Source : De Montfort University ) An academic who complained to a Hollywood studio over a controversial joke in Ted 2 has said the educational programmes the network aired in response were a 'good start'. Professor Simon Dyson , a sociologist
